title: The Art of Working with a Missionary Zeal | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: So, how do we develop the right attitude and avoid this, you know, Rajoguna behavior while being very, you know, trying to doubt-tell and do a missionary way of working?
segments.summary: The speaker asks how to maintain a missionary zeal without being influenced by Rajoguna and false ego, especially in light of Srila Prabhupada's gratitude to his Purvacharyas.

segments.key_quote: Satana will give you the transcendental knowledge by which that false ego is burnt, on a day today basis.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that sadhana and dharma are essential to burn the false ego and achieve purification through transcendental knowledge.

segments.key_quote: False ego should burn by acting as a servant of Krishna and should not create new false egos.
segments.summary: The speaker discusses dovetailing our past tendencies and burning the false ego by acting as a servant of Krishna.

segments.key_quote: The result of good sadhana is a consciousness that I am servant.
segments.summary: The speaker emphasizes the importance of morning sadhana to cultivate the consciousness of being a servant, which provides protection throughout the day.
